name: Drudge Report PM
description:
Want an AM / bright version? Try my original style: http://userstyles.org/styles/2908/drudge-report

Making Drudge Report more readable since 2007! • http://drudgereport.com/

A complete rework of drudgereport.com (well, as much as I could spackle css on such crusty html code), including an updated "web 2.0" logo, font beautification and link hover/visited prettiness. If you don't want to see ads, you should use AdBlock Plus.

style provided by Stephen VanDyke http://vforvandyke.com/

user.name: Stephen VanDyke
user.about: Just a guy making things pop on the internet.

additional_info:
February 10, 2018 • More grey with that pop of red in the hat. After two years of not touching anything, it still seems to work fine but was a little too yellow!
January 8, 2016 • Fixed the fonts on Windows back to Bitter, woops! Google changed things up and I hadn't noticed for a while (no new screenshot)
January 7, 2016 • Self/no link (usually news flashes/developing stories) with normal or red color will not transition to a dimmer, already visited state (no new screenshot)
March 5, 2015 • Hover transition added (no new screenshot)
January 4, 2014 • Fixed blue text set by font tag (this is rare, usually a Drudge teaser before a link goes up) no new screenshot
December 9, 2013 • Blue link hover fixes (regular blue was too dark), also applies to red hover
July 26, 2013 • Put correct style link in header comments, made :visited link colors a little brighter
July 24, 2013 • First uploaded, forked from http://userstyles.org/styles/2908/drudge-report
